about_the_game:
Arms Race 2 is turn base strategy game based on the events of the Cold War between the Americans and the Soviets spanning the 1950s through to the 1990s. Within a few hours of gameplay, players will travel through four decades of contention, paranoia, secrecy, proxy wars and the overarching "us vs. them" mentality.

Here's what makes Arms Race 2 unlike any other war-based strategy game:

- Immerse yourself in a realistic atmosphere that retells the story of the Cold War.
- Choose your side and play as either the Americans or the Soviets to rewrite the Cold War.
- Install military and espionage units to prop up the local allied government or transform rebels into revolutionaries in opposing countries.
- Establish spy networks to support government propaganda campaigns or shake loose the opposition's stronghold.
- Launch rockets, satellites and astronauts or cosmonauts into space to shock and amaze the world and prove that you are what this world needs.
- Devise your own strategies and tactics, forcing your opponent to play by your rules.
- Initiate pro-government parades or incite riots to plunge countries into chaos.
- Technological Nuclear, Arms and Space Race presented in historic units, models and names.
- Historical international events represented as Global Consequences which will have impact on both Super Powers and neutral regions
- UN powerful decisions which can help you to intervene other countries or protect it from intervention of your foe.
- Big database with pictures of most influenced politicians of its time in both Super Powers government.
- Vote and establish your government with it's own specifics ( politicians skills, conservative or liberal views )
- Industrialization, which helps international cooperation within your alliance and improve your gaming score

GAME EXPERIENCE:

Arms Race 2 is easy to play for gamers of all age and skill levels. In-game tutorial and easy-to-understand menus tell players about:

-Players' Influence in each country and worldwide.
-Their Opponent's Influence in Influenced, Neutral and Opposing countries.
-Number of military units stationed in each country.
-Spy network status and propaganda campaign success.
-Players budget, which can be used to enact your regime.
-Nuclear, Arms and Space Race Milestone achievements, which help win global Influence and Firepower.
-Each country's score value, which is used to calculate a player's budget.
-The players total score as game events unfold.
-Political and Global Consequences points - spend it wisely because it is limited.
-Firepower for military and geographic landscape – truly lead an Arms Race!

WHAT IS NEW?

Arms Race 2 is the sequel of Arms Race - The Cold War Era game, developed and released by Alina Digital. Arms Race 2 consists the core AR-TCWE game mechanics and all DLCs for it. AR2 is graphically redesigned to bring new improved user interface experience to the game. Also, there are new features added to AR2 as well ( including most wanted changes of the community for Global Consequences game mechanic ).
